Toothbrush app: A smart toothbrush is a type of app that provides users with feedback on their brushing habits and suggests ways to improve their oral hygiene routine. The app would track the user's brushing speed, pressure, and duration, and provide personalized recommendations for improving their technique.

Toothbrush with: A toothbrush with an accountability feature that provides users with regular progress reports on their brushing habits. The toothbrush would be connected to an app that tracks the user's brushing time, pressure, and technique, and provides feedback on areas where they need to improve.

Toothbrush with a built-in timer: A toothbrush with a built-in timer that alerts users when it's time to switch to a new quadrant or when they've brushed for the recommended two minutes. This would help users maintain a consistent brushing routine and ensure they cover all areas of their mouth.

Toothbrush with a pressure sensor: A toothbrush with a pressure sensor that alerts users when they'reing too hard or too soft. This would help prevent users from damaging their teeth or gums and ensure they're brushing with the right amount of pressure.

Toothbrush with a UV sensor: A toothbrush with a UV sensor that detects plaque and bacteria on the teeth and gums. The toothbrush would be connected to an app that provides users with personalized recommendations for improving their oral hygiene routine based on the results of the UV sensor.
